Class GameUnoState

java.lang.Object
org.example.eiscuno.model.serializable.GameUnoState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameUnoState extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the complete state of an UNO game, including the deck, table, players, turn information, and blocked statuses. This class is serializable to allow saving and loading the game state.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • GameUnoState

      public GameUnoState(Deck deck, Table table, Player humanPlayer, Player machinePlayer, boolean gameOver, boolean isHumanTurn, boolean isHumanBlocked, boolean isMachineBlocked)
      Constructs a new GameUnoState with the specified game components and statuses.
      Parameters:
      deck - the deck of cards used in the game
      table - the current state of the table with played cards
      humanPlayer - the human player in the game
      machinePlayer - the machine player in the game
      gameOver - indicates if the game has ended
      isHumanTurn - indicates if it is currently the human player's turn
      isHumanBlocked - indicates if the human player is currently blocked from playing
      isMachineBlocked - indicates if the machine player is currently blocked from playing
